column4: Sam]] found it growing in [[Ithilien]] as they journeyed through that land.<ref>{{TT
column5: IV4}}</ref> [[Eglantine Banks]], a Hobbit lass, was named after it,<ref>{{App
column6: Took}}</ref> so it probably grew in [[the Shire]] as well.

column1: The name is used for the sweetbriar. It derives from French referring to the "dog rose", ultimately from Latin ''aculeus'' "spine".
